page.title: 09CHARNWOOD LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: At the Leisure centre you can do a number of things like 5-a-side Football, Squash, Badminton, Basketball, Gymnastics, Hockey,Keepfit Table Tennis, Indoor Bowls and swimming . There are two swimming pools, one for the non swimmers and one for the better swimmers.There are seven squash courts and you can be lent a bat if you need it. It costs two pounds for a court to play on.The Leisure centre holds Galas for schools. Some of the most popular Galas are for swimming and indoor football. There is a creche for babies and toddlers. There are summer sports clubs and sauna rooms too. The Leisure centre is a very modern place. It is large and built of brown bricks, and part of the front looks like a railway carriage.
